summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered in March 2006. It details charges for express services and includes references to shipments involving Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating a connection between the two individuals.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the recipient of the FedEx invoice for shipping services.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as the sender in a shipment addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as the sender of a shipment to Jeffrey E. Epstein, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice is dated March 2006 and details shipping charges totaling $85.52.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is listed as the recipient of the invoice.
Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as the sender of a shipment to Epstein.
The document includes references to FedEx services and customs details.
There are multiple mentions of Epstein's address, indicating his residence at the time.
